name: Send notification via IFTTT
description: Reflects the outcome of the build by changing the color of your, for instance, Philips Hue lamp with IFTTT.
author: Robert Raaijmakers

inputs.name: sendMailFrom
inputs.label: Email from
inputs.helpMarkDown: E-mailaddress specified in IFTTT as 'send from' address.

inputs.name: sendMailTo
inputs.label: Email to
inputs.helpMarkDown: E-mailaddress to send email to. Default IFTTT mail address is: trigger@recipe.ifttt.com

inputs.name: buildNames
inputs.label: Included Builds
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma seperated list of builds that are included to check, if none provided, all builds are checked.

inputs.name: smtpServer
inputs.label: SMTP Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Valid SMTP server to use for sending an email to IFTTT.

inputs.name: smtpPortVariable
inputs.label: SMTP Port
inputs.helpMarkDown: The port number for the smtp port. Default is 25, or 587 for SSL.

inputs.name: smtpUserName
inputs.label: SMTP Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username to login on SMTP server.

inputs.name: smtpPassword
inputs.label: SMTP Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password belonging to Username to login on SMTP server.

inputs.name: smtpUseSslVariable
inputs.label: SMTP Use SSL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Determines if you want to use SSL to connect to the SMTP server.
